scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some well-deserved time off to recharge. However, during your time away, a colleague messages you privately, saying thereâ€™s an urgent task that needs immediate attention. The request creates a dilemma as you try to balance respecting your time off while feeling the pressure to help with the urgent task. You chose to prioritize your time off and asked your colleague to reach out to another person. Later, you meet with [Monica] and [Bob] at a team gathering. [Monica] glances at you with a concerned expression, 'Hey [Alex], I heard you didn't help with the urgent task while you were on leave. [Bob] had to stay late to cover for you. What happened?' You responded by saying it was fair to ask someone else to handle it since you were on leave. [Bob] then sighs and says, 'I understand you're on leave, but couldn't you have at least checked in to see if it was really urgent? It put a lot of pressure on us.' You acknowledged this and said you should have checked in briefly to assess the situation. [Monica] crosses her arms and adds, 'It's not just about this one time, [Alex]. We need to know we can count on each other, even when it's inconvenient.' You suggest revisiting the emergency protocols. The conversation continues.
scenes.description: [Bob] rubs his temples and says, 'I get that we need to revisit protocols, but it really felt like you were totally unreachable. How can we rely on you in high-pressure situations?'

options.text: I understand. I'll make an effort to ensure I'm reachable during critical times.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the concern and show empathy, willing to improve your availability in critical situations.

options.text: I see your point, but there's a need for clear boundaries to prevent burnout.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the concern but also emphasize the need for boundaries, showing good self-regulation and emotional perception.

options.text: We should come up with a system that doesn't rely on one person being available all the time.
options.analysis: You suggest a constructive solution for future emergencies, showing good social skills and balanced emotional perception.
